item.title: Donator and staff only items
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

My bad, I forgot a closing parenthesis.

if(wearID == 9800 && (donator != 1 || playerRights == 0)) {
    sM("You must be a Donator or Staff To Wear This");
    return false;
}

Not sure if it’s your problem, if you still have 100 errors. It’s not this code that’s doing it.

Read full topic

item.title: Donator and staff only items
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

x sam x:

but it works without that open bracket? and how would i make it staff only as well?

How can it work without that open brace if you got 100 errors? You had a close brace without an open brace, this is not legal and is the highest cause of the 100 errors.

PS; like this.

if(wearID == 9800 && (donator != 1 || playerRights == 0) {
    sM("You must be a Donator or Staff To Wear This");
    return false;
}

Read full topic

item.title: Donator and staff only items
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

You’re missing a open brace.

if(wearID == 9800 && (donator != 1) {
    sM("You must be a Donator To Wear This");
    return false;
}

Fix’t.

Read full topic

item.description:

if(wearID == 9800 && (donator != 1)
sM(“You must be a Donator To Wear This”);
return false;
}
